ORDER BY a.brd_no DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{rowPerPage}
SELECT CEIL(COUNT(*)/#{rowPerPage}) AS max_page FROM tb_board a INNER JOIN tb_board_category b ON (a.brd_no = b.brd_no) INNER JOIN tb_category c ON (b.cat_no = c.cat_no) WHERE 1=1 AND a.del_yn = 'N'
